website_summaries.verdict: One of the few rashguards made for boys and girls, with full sun and rash protection.
pros: Offers a slim fit and lots of protection for sensitive skin
Parents love the effective sun protection
Made by a well-known surf brand
cons: Sizing is off, so order larger size

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several O'Neill rashguards and have been happy with durability and fit. The last two thinned in spots on the first few wears. Returned both. Don't know if they were old or damaged, but weren't what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CT Claddagh

customer_reviews.title: Does What It’s Supposed To Do
customer_reviews.text: As far as swim shirts go this one does what it’s supposed to do. The fit was great, which I wasn’t sure about. My son’s only complaint is that the material is very thin and it clung to him the moment it got wet. I’ve purchased other swim shirts that were thicker and retained their shape/fit a lot better when wet. That was the only issue, otherwise it was a good purchase. The color matched his swim trunks perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria's Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered O'Neill swim shirts this year and my son loves them--we now own three in different colors! I was hesitant to buy the first one due to price, but these are amazing quality and worth every penny. My son is a little bit insecure about a small amount of extra weight he carries through the middle and these shirts are perfect for him because they are just loose enough to camouflage his midsection but tight enough to look like a swim shirt and not an everyday shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wilms

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Swim shirt. Save the sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swim shirt for my boys. Came in a large variety of colors, which was great, as I could buy different colors for each one and not get them mixed up. Drys off really quickly, and protects against the sun, saving tons of sunscreen and time applying sunscreen, which the boys hate doing. Came in all the sizes I needed and all of them fit perfectly. Highly recommend getting sun shirts for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 10 year old. It is very well made and thicker than others but i presume that is the UV protection. It is good since he is slim and will insulate from the cold waters. It is slim fit which is fine since he is slim but if you son is huskier then choose one (1) size larger.
customer_reviews.author: JohnRiverdale

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the O'Neill wetsuits
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the O'Neill wetsuits. This is the 4th UV Sun Protection shirt I've ordered. Last year I bought one for my husband and one for myself and liked them so much that I bought my husband a second shirt and order one for my 7 yr old son. He loved it and wore it most of the time we were on a week long vacation at a beach resort.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my kids from getting sunburned
customer_reviews.text: My kids are fair-skinned and burn easily. A rash guard is a must in the summer for UV protection. This product is tailored-fitting but not tight. It's just right, looks good, and washes well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: midwestjane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 year old. He is very lean and small framed. It is not boxy or too large around the waist. If you have a larger larger frame, you may want to go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: HJK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I got two for my 5 yo, a size 8&10, 8 will probably not fit him next summer. He is 4 foot 1 and 65lbs. The sea glass one is a really beautiful green color and the red is as pictured. They are pricey but the quality is a lot better than ones we have bought for only 5$ less.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for kids
customer_reviews.text: My bad. I missed the part about this being a "youth" shirt and had to return it. That said, I bought it because these are the best when out in the sun and snorkeling. I have two others that I used in Fiji and they were spectacular. Hand wash though... they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for toddlers.  Prevent Sunburn!  Save on Suntan Lotion!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these shirts. We have a few of these now in multiple colors. They are great at preventing Sunburn, and also serve as Rash guards from all sorts of water activities. Fit is as expected. Wash / Hang dry and they've never shrunk / faded. I would definitely recommend, and will be buying larger sizes as he grows bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Matrix

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: the only reason I gave this 4 stars is that it runs small. It has a very slim fit, which is fine for my tall skinny boy, but it looks a tad short on him and I had already sized up. good quality, it will last, but sadly he will outgrow it well before it has gotten its use.
customer_reviews.author: ingrid goyette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 14 for my son (size 12) that didn't want it skin tight. He states it is comfortable. I do notice that the white does not stay white but I believe that is because of our chlorinated pool.
customer_reviews.author: JlS

customer_reviews.title: White not the best idea for kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice rash guard, but maybe next time I wouldn’t go with white. Been scrubbing dirt, grass and popsicle stains out all summer.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing. Second time this happens. Wasted money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second rashguard I buy, and the second one the real size is very different than what is printed in the t-shirt. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: DanJV

customer_reviews.title: 12 SLIM sizing not regular
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was off. I bought a size 12 but it is a SLIM! So its too short and too tight. Passing it down to younger siblings but disappointed no where it said it would be a slim
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Four

customer_reviews.title: Good sun shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I got the size 6 for my daughter who will be 5 in about a month! She's normally a 4/5! It's a little bit big on her so I would say it runs true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Long family

customer_reviews.title: Great thick material
customer_reviews.text: Great, thick, vibrant color with nice stitching and flat seams. More lime green instead of yellow but I’m certainly not going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping the sun off. Excellent fabric, excellent fit for my slim boy (50", 50 pounds). I have a bunch of O'Neill swim clothing, and am never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RANG

customer_reviews.title: Great rashguard!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this rashguard. Great color, great quality. We have used it many times already at the beach, in our salt water pool and in chlorine pools. It is holding its color and shape. I will definitely be getting more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Not our cup of tea but as described
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by this shirt....much thicker / less breathable than expected and cut more in the neck and shoulders like a wet suit than shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Noller

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, worked as expected, reasonably priced. I won’t buy 3rd party clothing anymore however brand names from Amazon have never been disappointing for me.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. The description did not mention it is "slim fit" therefore I had to return purchase. Material quality was nice though, it was simply about 2 sizes smaller than average
customer_reviews.author: Lili Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: My son gotta VERY severe sunburn before we purchased the shirt. He was afraid to go out when the sun was out, but he really wanted to play in our pool. This shirt protects him and gives him the piece of mind he needs! He wears it daily and it has kept the sun exposure from impacting his sensitive skin. Plus it's blue his favorite color. It was well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt however both armpits are not sewn same spot missing stitches leaving holes in the arms 😢
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Saved his skin
customer_reviews.text: We spent a week in the Bahamas and my son burns very easily. We bought this to protect him. He would wear each day after a couple hours and we did not have 1 sunburn all week.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful gift for my grandson. The fit is perfect. I loved the protection it provides from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandson when we vacationed at the beach, and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Nice, runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 12 based on reviews. Runs a bit small so next time we will order the 14. Very nice quality and the color makes it easy to see my son in the pool or at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: O. Howard

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Great swim top, great quality, size 8 Fitz my Average sized 7 year old perfect, I Would definitely recommend it. I’m going to buy for my other kids also.
customer_reviews.author: lisa tinkler

customer_reviews.title: Only one wear
customer_reviews.text: After the first wear, this shirt yellowed from the sunscreen. Unfortunately, it now just looks filthy. We bought another color and the blue has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: My son has fair skin so swim shirts help so ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has fair skin so swim shirts help so much when we go to the beach. He loves this shirt and will even wear with shorts out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: True to size. My kid wore it all day, all summer long and it still looks good. Washes well. We got the lime green. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: William funk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice colors. This is a conventional rashguard, the one that doesn't "breathe"
customer_reviews.author: La Reya

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, lots of sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, lots of sun protection. Here at the beach this week and my son has worn several times to keep from getting a sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, runs large
customer_reviews.text: Runs very large. Nice quality. Had to return due to size.
customer_reviews.author: Bdj

customer_reviews.title: Take their advice & go up a size
customer_reviews.text: I went up a size per the reviews...so glad I did. Was pleased with fit & performance. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kid
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric and color—my son loves the shirt! However, the hem unraveled in less than a week. I wasn’t too happy about that, but my son couldn’t care less, and still wears it every time he goes swimming!
customer_reviews.author: susie krehbiel

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great for blocking the sun as my son swims at the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Colors shown aren’t accurate
customer_reviews.text: The green and yellow colors in the photos are not accurate. The green is really a light sea green and the yellow is neon green. Also runs small. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Pwphilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my son for a week in cozumel. Worked well, no sunburn, no rash. Worked as expected
customer_reviews.author: Turkey 2

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple of months. Use 2-3 times weekly. Holds up very well. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice, washes great. Love this shirt. I was skeptikal because of the brand and my son beimg "husky" but it fot wonderful injust odered up a size
customer_reviews.author: Jade skowronek

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our son used this in Maui and no sun burn! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KayLeen Anghelina

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, these shirts all seem to be fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, these shirts all seem to be fit small so I typically order 1 to 2 sizes larger than what my son normally wears.
customer_reviews.author: FLmom

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and protection
customer_reviews.text: Great water shirt. Bought these for my kids for the beach and they work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage up on the neck!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it doesn’t give my son a rash and it fits perfect. We use it for the beach and pool.
customer_reviews.author: deirdre fell obrien

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice but starting to come apart at seems after one week
customer_reviews.text: I have a tall lean 11 year old. 14/16 fits well. Unfortunately the shirt is coming apart at the seems after just one week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of these shirts for my kids and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these shirts for my kids and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jager

customer_reviews.title: Nice swim shirts for my son
customer_reviews.text: Nice swim shirts for my son. I ordered short and long sleeve and happy with them. Run slightly large but still okay, he'll outgrow it before I know it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for our trip to the islands. My daughter loved the bright pink color
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fit my child perfectly. Never got sunburned after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my child perfectly. Never got sunburned after a week on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son (age 11) usually hates these shirts, but ...
customer_reviews.text: My son (age 11) usually hates these shirts, but this one is different. It maintained it's shape all season and held up well in the pool and ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality. It was a little bigger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality. It was a little bigger than I expected from past experience with O'Neill rash guards, but she'll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: The swim shirt came very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was very good and is made with quality material.
customer_reviews.author: BReasy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the trick! One season in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the trick! One season in and the label/l;ogo thingy is starting to peel off the back, but whatever. It shoes no other signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Hayward

customer_reviews.title: good shirt
customer_reviews.text: nice shirt.My kid loves it (although he recently lost it). I will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: F. Iacobelli

customer_reviews.title: We got a Lrg for our 10 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: We got a Lrg for our 10 year old daughter and it fits perfectly with a little room to grow. Has really helped in protecting her back, which always gets sunburned!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnshinne

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Day Florida Sun
customer_reviews.text: My girls wear these shirts with their bikini bottoms on our boat all day and they are protected all day!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 8 yr old son. He loves it while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: The fit is generous, but not baggy (a good fit for a child). The material is thick enough that my child could wear it without a bikini top under, but not so thick that she gets over-warm.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product ... my son feel so comfortable using it
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Mori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: briecks

customer_reviews.title: fits right, wears well
customer_reviews.text: ordered size 12 for my 11-year old, normal-sized son. Fits him well--a little large but will last 2 summers. This shirt is well-made and has washed well so far. No discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter likes a looser fit, so we bought a size up, and it's perfect. We like the sun protection is provides.
customer_reviews.author: NerdK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase and size is accurate. Made well and not super thin like other rash guards. You can tell this one will last and wash well. I have gone through at least 10 rash guards for my son and this is by far the best quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: KMK2

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that I received the wrong item. When I really need to the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The whole family was wearing O'NEILL wetsuits on our recent Hawaii vacation. Good, durable wetsuit and it will definitely save you from sumburn!
customer_reviews.author: Julia S.

customer_reviews.title: good material and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: good material and arrived on time, it's as expected, a little small
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: true to size!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price. Fit as expected and true to size. Material stretches and is soft.
customer_reviews.author: No name

product_meta.title: O'Neill Youth Basic Skins UPF 50+ Short Sleeve Sun Shirt
product_meta.description: World-renowned O'Neill quality at value-driven prices. The Basic Skins offers U.P.F. 50+ Ultraviolet Protection with cleanly designed graphics and minimal seam placement for rash prevention.
feature_bullets: Excellent 50+ UVPF Sun protection for active kids - no more chasing them down for more sunscreen
Quality materials, sturdy seams, with simple graphics at a lower price than O'Neill's surf line of products
Sized to fit close to the body to minimize drag in the water - go up a size or two for a looser fit
